title: Stupid. But not in any good way
review:
Tyson knocked out the tard. I smiled.
Closest I came to laughter.

title: Total Tosh
review: No reason provided to be spidey, no reason to avoid killing or save the day, no ethos at all and the ferry scene is str8 dumb.

title: This movie is insulting.
review: After embarrassing the Hulk in Infinity, one was assuredly expecting an upgrade. No.With a intricate plot and a surely checkmate event in Infinity, the solution had to be mind-blowing. No.What we got was fat jokes and the two most unquestionably powerful characters benched for the WHOLE movie, in a seriously shameful manner, melded with a brain-dead undoing that doesn't make sense or do justice to Infinity.
